author: hwright
msg: When committing through the Ev2 shims, be sure we properly construct the path
to be use when fetching data from the FS.
Current number of Ev2 test failures: 459
(prop_fetch_func, kind_fetch_func, fetch_base_func): Use the base_path to
create a FS-absolute path for fetching the required information.

author: aconway
msg: QPID-3603: Fix initialization race in QueueReplicator.
Was core dumping occasionally due to QueueReplicator being deleted before
